__e: Do you have any idea how many people Oliver has killed with that bow and arrow?
I don't even let him finish his sentence, he says, "Philippe, what about a bow and arrrr...?"
And if you two fellows will wait until I get through carving this little bow and arrow, I'll be happy to give you a little demonstration.
I don't even let him finish his sentence, he says, "Philippe, what about a bow and arrrr...?"
You take that one... and go right ahead.
And if you two fellows will wait until I get through carving this little bow and arrow, I'll be happy to give you a little demonstration.
If you go back to Caprica and bring me the arrow, it will show us the way to Earth.
Here I am, following time's arrow - and my mother's breath.
But surely it was the dart that killed the poor woman.
At the risk of ending up with an arrow in my eye, can I ask...
Put a bolt in them for what they did.
Firing an arrow into a wall is hardly what I call...
I don't! What are you going to do, put an arrow in him?
Yeah, so under control that I almost put another arrow in you.
Like you did last time when you shot an arrow at my head?
Father was shot by an arrow like this.
Yep, and he was hit by a dart.
You were lucky not to get hit by the spears or arrows yourself.
Are you too stupid to be an arrow?
Then I hope you're prepared to use that arrow.
Let me go with you and I'll finish this with one arrow.
